short_summary: Port Edward Small Craft Harbour Project Repair
description: Port Edward Float 837 & 816 Repairs - British Columbia (BC)\\
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Port Edward Float 837 & 816 Repairs

### Tender Information

* **Title (English/French)**: Port Edward Float 837 & 816 Repairs - British Columbia (BC) / Réparation des brise-lames flottants 816 et 837 de Port Edward – Colombie-Britannique
* **Reference Number (English/French)**: cb-789-63319256 / numéro de référence cb-789-63319256
* **Solicitation Number (English/French)**: 30004516 / numéro de sollicitation 30004516
* **Publication Date (English/French)**: October 4, 2023 / date de publication Le 4 octobre 2023

### Tender Details

* **Tender Description (English/French)**: The work comprises repairs to the existing steel pipe breakwater float at Port Edward Small Craft Harbour.
* **Mandatory Items:**
	+ Mobilization/Demobilization
	+ Install Float Buoyancy Billets
	+ Supply and Install Bolted Pipe Connections
* **Optional Items:**
	+ Install Injection Foam Floatation
	+ Supply of Foam Buoyancy Billets
	+ Upgrade Buoyancy Billets to Plastic Encapsulated
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** October 18, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Local Time)
* **Anticipated Contract Commencement Date:** November 3, 2023
* **Anticipated Contract Completion Date:** February 28, 2024

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method (English/French)**: Competitive - Open bidding / Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) / Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)
* **Regions of Opportunity (English/French)**: British Columbia / Colombie-Britannique
* **Contracting Entity:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada / Pêches et Océans Canada

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Tammy O'Toole
* **Email:** tammy.otoole@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (343) 550-1758
* **Address:** 200, Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario,
